name: Ploppy McSloppy's Pooper Scooper Simulator 2022
description:
New UPDATE! (Consider leaving a review and following us!!)

Welcome to "Ploppy McSloppy's Pooper Scooper Simulator 2022".

What a beautiful masterpiece....  All you do is throw the poop down the well and level up! What potential it has.

Two kinds of poop, two wells! Game will be more worked on time permitting. There's 2 bosses, weapons, armor and more you can equip, change window colours etc! HAVE FUN!

Controls

WASD controls : Move

ENTER : Pick up the poop

HOLD SHIFT : Sprint
